explanation: [0-0] On a wooden board, there is a wooden stick.
[0-3] Then a hand places the stick against the corner of the board, and a pencil rotates to draw a line on the bottom of the stick.

[7-9] Subsequently, some white glue is squeezed into the hole, and a hand inserts a small wooden stick into the hole and hammers it in with a hammer.

[9-15] Then the shot changes, some white glue is squeezed onto the small wooden stick, and a finger spreads the glue on the surface of the small and large wooden sticks. Then the shot changes, a large wooden stick is inserted into the small wooden stick, finally a hand wipes off the exposed glue with a yellow rag, and a green check mark appears on the screen.
